snippet: In his comments to the Faith and Freedom Coalition, Mitt Romney stuck with conservative positions popular with his audience, the loyal contingent of Republicans whose turnout will be crucial for him in November.
abstract: In his comments to the Faith and Freedom Coalition, Mitt Romney stuck with conservative positions popular with his audience, the loyal contingent of Republicans whose turnout will be crucial for him in November.

headline.main: Romney Paints Himself as the Anti-Obama
